snippet.title: Battalion 1944 | PC Launch Trailer | Square Enix Collective | PEGI
snippet.description:
Battalion recaptures the core of classic competitive shooters & refines the ‘classic’ FPS feel for the next generation. Focusing on 5v5 infantry combat, where precise flick shots with your Kar98, covering fire with your Thompson and fluid movement are key to clutching every round for your team.

The Battalion 1944: Eastern Front update will go live roughly around these times: 

🇬🇧 17:00 (BST)
🇺🇸 09:00 (PST)
🇪🇺 18:00 (CEST)
🇧🇷 13:00 (BRT)
🇦🇺 02:00 (AEST)

The update size is 7.8GB (If you have the old version installed). 

Pick it up here: https://weblet.square-enix.com/geojmp.php?d=BATTALION1944&l=gamepage
